mapper.sql: TQD_ID, QD_ID, TARGET_CODE, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ht_tar_query_dim_tb
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from ht_tar_query_dim_tb where TQD_ID = #{tqdId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and OP_TYPE != 'D'
mapper.insert: insert into ht_tar_query_dim_tb (TQD_ID, QD_ID, TARGET_CODE, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID) values (#{tqdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ht_tar_query_dim_tb
QD_ID,
TARGET_CODE,
OP_TYPE,
CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
CREATOR_ID,
MODIFIER_ID
#{qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update ht_tar_query_dim_tb
TQD_ID = #{record.tqdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QD_ID = #{record.qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TARGET_CODE = #{record.targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ht_tar_query_dim_tb set TQD_ID = #{record.tqdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QD_ID = #{record.qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TARGET_CODE = #{record.targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ht_tar_query_dim_tb
QD_ID = #{qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TQD_ID = #{tqdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ht_tar_query_dim_tb set QD_ID = #{qdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TQD_ID = #{tqdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from ht_tar_query_dim_tb where TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and OP_TYPE != 'D'
mapper.update: UPDATE ht_tar_query_dim_tb SET OP_TYPE = "D" WHERE TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ht_tar_query_dim_tb
OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
